StackLayout: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.
AppBar: Show me Kendo UI AppBar examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.
Menu: Show me Kendo UI Menu examples with navigation patterns, active states, and responsive behavior. Include examples for different menu structures and styling. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.
Avatar: Show me Kendo Image for small monochrome logos with containment and max-height constraints.
Button: Show me Kendo Button as form submit with built-in loading indicator and success/error visual states.
Drawer: Show me Kendo Drawer examples for mobile navigation with slide-in from right, focus trap, overlay, and close on route select. Include item templates with icons and a footer CTA button.
ListView: Show me Kendo UI ListView examples with data binding, sorting, filtering, and pagination. Include examples with realistic sample data, custom cell templates, and responsive design. Provide complete implementation with all necessary props.
Card: Show me Kendo UI Card examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.
Grid: Show me Kendo Grid/Flex layout for footers with multiple columns and responsive stacking.
Typography: Show me Kendo UI Typography examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.
Label: Show me Kendo UI Label examples with different variants, sizes, and styling options. Include examples for common display patterns and accessibility features. Provide complete implementation with all props.
ProgressBar: Show me Kendo ProgressBar determinate examples with value animation on viewport, aria attributes, and percentage label formatting.
Badge: Show me Kendo Badge usage for percentage indicators with neutral styling.
Toolbar: Show me Kendo ChipList or Toolbar with Chips for filterable galleries, including selection, multi/single modes, and change events.
Chip: Show me Kendo Chip examples with selected state and icons.
Popup: Show me Kendo UI Popup examples with different types, positioning, and animation. Include examples for success, error, warning, and info states. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.
Dialog: Show me Kendo Dialog/Window examples used as a lightbox with full-screen or large size, overlay, close button, and keyboard handling (ESC, focus trap).
ScrollView: Show me Kendo Carousel examples for testimonials with variable slide content, autoplay with pause on hover, and accessible controls (aria-live polite).
ExpansionPanel: Show me Kendo UI ExpansionPanel examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.
Form: Show me Kendo Form examples with field-level validation, async submit with loading spinner, and error summary. Include integration with TextBox, TextArea, and Checkbox.
TextBox: Show me Kendo TextBox medium length with placeholder and optional state.
Error: Show me Kendo UI Error examples with different types, positioning, and animation. Include examples for success, error, warning, and info states. Provide complete implementation with event handlers.
TextArea: Show me Kendo TextArea with character count, min length validation, and auto-resize.
Checkbox: Show me Kendo CheckBox with label linking to Privacy Policy and indeterminate state example.
PanelBar: Show me Kendo UI PanelBar examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.
Notification: Show me Kendo Alert/Notification examples for form submission results with success and error variants, dismiss action, and auto-hide options.
